name: pearscale-api
description: A social media platform for pear lovers

scripts.docker-workaround: docker run -d --name pearscale-api --network pearscale -p "27017:27017" -v pearscale-vol:/data/db -e "MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=peargod" -e "MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=pear" mongo:latest
scripts.docker-shell: docker run --rm -it --network pearscale mongo:latest mongo --host pearscale-api --username peargod --password pear --authenticationDatabase admin
